selections.name: Fondled
selections.reason: Strong performance at this track last start (2nd), draws perfectly in barrier 3, and handles the conditions. The one to beat.

selections.name: Il Patrigno
selections.reason: Resuming after showing ability last preparation with a 3rd on the synthetic. Trialled well.

selections.name: Divine Empress
selections.reason: Showed improvement at Sale last start. Draws the inside gate which is an advantage here.

selections.name: Her Legacy
selections.reason: Resuming. Placed at Wodonga last prep and draws soft. Watch for market moves.

danger_horse.name: Il Patrigno
danger_horse.reason: Fresh form suggests he can challenge the favorite if ready to go.

selections.name: Lufitaah
selections.reason: Brings the strongest exposed form with a 2nd at Bendigo over this trip. Draws well.

selections.name: Woollen
selections.reason: First starter by Savabeel. Draws barrier 1 and stable strikes well with debutants.

selections.name: Temu Tilly
selections.reason: Ran a solid 4th on debut at Kilmore. Will be improved by the experience.

selections.name: Jive Dancer
selections.reason: First starter by Hellbent. Watch betting for stable confidence.

danger_horse.name: Woollen
danger_horse.reason: Pedigree suggests ability and the inside draw is a major plus.

selections.name: Pick Wisely
selections.reason: Consistent performer with 4 seconds from 7 starts. Placed last two and this field is weak. Clear top pick.

selections.name: Titan's Spirit
selections.reason: Placed at Pakenham last start. Improving type who should handle the distance.

selections.name: Adamana
selections.reason: Resuming. Has placed form in better races than this. Each-way hope.

selections.name: Bolshie
selections.reason: Experienced campaigner who is usually around the mark. Place chance.

danger_horse.name: Titan's Spirit
danger_horse.reason: The main threat if the favorite finds trouble, though the wide gate is a negative.

selections.name: Nothin' Wong Here
selections.reason: Ran 3rd in a Metro maiden at Caulfield Heath last start. That form is superior to this field.

selections.name: Luigi The Brave
selections.reason: Runner-up at this track and distance last start. Proven suitability to conditions.

selections.name: Lady Thinkabell
selections.reason: Also runner-up at this track last start (different race). In good form.

selections.name: Princess Painton
selections.reason: Consistent placer who draws the rail. Should get a soft run.

danger_horse.name: Luigi The Brave
danger_horse.reason: Track and distance specialist who will be hard to hold out.

selections.name: Duke Of Bedford
selections.reason: Class runner resuming. Drops massively in grade from what he contested last prep. If fit, wins.

selections.name: So Long Ago
selections.reason: Last start winner at Werribee. In form and draws well.

selections.name: Filadeel
selections.reason: Proven wet tracker who won well at Sale on Heavy. Conditions suit.

selections.name: Sinhalese
selections.reason: Has shown ability and should appreciate the distance.

danger_horse.name: So Long Ago
danger_horse.reason: Winning form is good form, and the low draw gives a tactical advantage.

selections.name: Elvis
selections.reason: Won well at Kilmore last start. Draws barrier 1 to dictate or box seat. Hard to beat.

selections.name: Rock The Bar
selections.reason: Consistent type coming off a 2nd at Seymour. Solid rating for this grade.

selections.name: Runway Ruler
selections.reason: Runner-up at Ballarat last start. Racing well and draws nicely.

selections.name: It's Gnarly
selections.reason: Progressive 3yo who won his maiden well. Can step up.

danger_horse.name: Rock The Bar
danger_horse.reason: Consistent and will be hitting the line hard.

selections.name: Brutify
selections.reason: Last start winner at Colac. In peak form and draws a middle gate.

selections.name: That's All Good
selections.reason: Also a last start winner (Yarra Valley). Wide gate is the concern but has speed.

selections.name: Rosie's Prophecy
selections.reason: Consistent mare who placed at Wangaratta last start. Good each-way value.

selections.name: Symphonite
selections.reason: Resuming. Has performed well fresh previously. Watch market.

danger_horse.name: That's All Good
danger_horse.reason: Winning form, but needs luck from the wide barrier.

selections.name: Benefitsofmine
selections.reason: Resuming. Showed city class potential last prep with placings at Doomben/Eagle Farm. Rates highly.

selections.name: Trust In Chad
selections.reason: Last start winner at Albury. Draws perfectly in barrier 2.

selections.name: Naval Force
selections.reason: Resuming. Consistent type who usually runs a bold race fresh.

selections.name: Secret Hell
selections.reason: Resuming. Won maiden last prep and has upside.

danger_horse.name: Trust In Chad
danger_horse.reason: Winning form and an ideal map makes him a major player.
